Class DroppableArea

java.lang.Object
domain.eventing.Subscribeable
domain.DrawableObject
domain.playerInput.dragndrop.DroppableArea
Direct Known Subclasses:
BagGI, Treasury
public abstract class DroppableArea extends DrawableObject
an area where you can drop objects and from where you can drag them
